text: The Piper J-3 Cub is an American light aircraft that was built between 1938 and 1947 by Piper Aircraft.The Cub is Piper Aircraft's most-produced model, with nearly 20,000 built in the United States. == Variants == === Civil === ; J-3 ; J3C-40 ; J3C-50 ; J3C-50S ; J3C-65 ; J3C-65S ; J3F-50 ; J3F-50S ; J3F-60 ; J3F-60S ; J3F-65 ; J3F-65S ; J3L ; J3L-S ; J3L-65 ; J3L-65S ; J3P ; J-3R ; J-3X ; Cammandre 1 ; Poullin J.5A ; Poullin J.5B ; Wagner Twin Cub === Military === ; YO-59 ; O-59 ; O-59A ; L-4 ; L-4A ; L-4B ; L-4C ; L-4D ; L-4H ; L-4J ; UC-83A ; TG-8 ; LNP ; NE-1 ; NE-2 : : Category:American aircraft
title: Piper J-3 Cub
